root.name: X-Change 2
root.description: X-Change 2 continues the story of one Takuya Aihara a chemistry student who was turned into girl by a strange chemistry accident.NOTE: The characters are all in junior college in US localizations of the game due to child pornography laws

similar_games.game: Kangoku Suieibu: Kyouei Mizugi ni Kuikomu Inbi na Shitai
